title: Hiragana Basics Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of basic hiragana characters with this quiz.

items.question: い
items.hint: Looks like a straight line with a little hook at the top.

items.question: う
items.hint: Resembles the letter 'u' with a curve.

items.question: え
items.hint: Similar to the letter 'e' but more rounded.

items.question: お
items.hint: Looks like a circle with a little tail.

items.question: か
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a short one and a longer one.

items.question: き
items.hint: Starts with a short horizontal line, followed by two diagonal lines.

items.question: く
items.hint: Resembles a letter 'ku' with a curve at the top.

items.question: け
items.hint: Combination of two strokes: a long one and a short one.

items.question: こ
items.hint: Looks like a circle with a small line coming out from the right.
